ALEXA_CODE.description: Type the code when you got by scanning QR through WhatsApp.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 91xxxxxxxxx,0

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

OWNER_NAME.description: Fill your name in here. it will show your name in .owner command reply

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

INBO_BLOCK.description: Inbox Blocking System. True koduthal ningalude pml vann chila bad words upoayogikunnavare bot block aakum block aakendengil false kodukuka

WELCOME.description: You can select welcome as gif/pp

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

CMD_LIST.description: You can change Command list emojis like: help/â¤ï¸/ğŸ˜…/ğŸƒ/ğŸ’Œ.)

AUTO_BÄ°O.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

BAD_WORDS.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by Alexa Wa Bot

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the Alexa won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

NUMBER.description: Enter the owner number, You must enter your number, Please don't enter the number with country code ( example : 91 for indian ) Also don't enter space & + on the number ( example : 91996132xxxx for indian ). ( This number will be shown on some commands )

WORK_TYPE.description: Alexa Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the Alexa. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your Alexa.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.
